com.movlad.semviz.core.graphics

Class ShaderProgram

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.movlad.semviz.core.graphics.ShaderProgram

  • public class ShaderProgram
extends java.lang.Object
    Shader program that runs on the GPU. Compiled from the sources for a vertex shader and a fragment shader.

        gl - is the context
        vertexShaderSource - is the GLSL source for the vertex shader
        fragmentShaderSource - is the GLSL source for the fragment shader

      • compileShader

        private int compileShader(int type,
                          java.lang.String[] source)
                   throws com.jogamp.opengl.GLException
        Compiles a shader component of the program.
        Parameters:
        type - is the type of shader, GL_VERTEX_SHADER or GL_FRAGMENT_SHADER
        source - is the GLSL source code for the shader
        Returns:
        the id of the created shader if no exception was raised
        Throws:
        com.jogamp.opengl.GLException - if the shader fails to compile

      • createProgram

        private int createProgram(java.lang.String[] vertexShaderSource,
                          java.lang.String[] fragmentShaderSource)
                   throws com.jogamp.opengl.GLException
        Links the vertex and fragment shaders to the program.
        Parameters:
        vertexShaderSource - is the GLSL source for the vertex shader
        fragmentShaderSource - is the GLSL source for the fragment shader
        Returns:
        the id of the created program
        Throws:
        com.jogamp.opengl.GLException - upon shader failed shader compilation, linkage or program validation

      • parse

        private ShaderSource parse(java.lang.String path)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Parses a .glsl file and returns the shader source codes.
        Parameters:
        path - is the path of the .glsl file
        Returns:
        the source code for the shaders
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the shader file is not found/failed to create streams/reader
